title: P. Balaraman
text: P. Balaraman is an Indian politician from <a href="Tamil%20Nadu">Tamil Nadu</a>, India. He was elected from the <a href="Ponneri%20%28state%20assembly%20constituency%29">Ponneri constituency</a> to the <a href="Fifteenth%20Assembly%20of%20Tamil%20Nadu">Fifteenth Tamil Nadu Legislative Assembly</a> as a member of the <a href="All%20India%20Anna%20Dravida%20Munnetra%20Kazhagam">All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam</a> political party in the <a href="2016%20Tamil%20Nadu%20Legislative%20Assembly%20election">2016 Tamil Nadu legislative assembly elections</a>.
